parameters.name: CertType
parameters.description:
The certificate type. Valid values:

*   **upload**: a custom certificate
*   **cas**: a certificate that is purchased from Certificate Management Service
*   **free**: a free certificate (for testing)

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name that is secured by the certificate. The domain name uses `HTTPS`-based acceleration.

parameters.name: ForceSet
parameters.description: Specifies whether to check the certificate name for duplicates. A value of 1 indicates that the system does not perform the check and overwrites the information about the certificate that has the same name. Set the value to **1**.

parameters.name: SSLPri
parameters.description:
The private key.

>  This parameter is required only if you set the SSLProtocol parameter to on.

parameters.name: SSLProtocol
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the HTTPS certificate. Valid values:

*   **on**. If you set this parameter to **on**, you must also specify the SSLPub and SSLPri parameters.
*   **off**. This is the default value.

parameters.name: SSLPub
parameters.description:
The public key.

>  This parameter is required only if you set the SSLProtocol parameter to on.
